title: @POTUS: "But Ukraine can stop Putin if we stand with Ukraine and provide it the weapons it needs to defend itself" per @POTUS...
content: @POTUS: "But Ukraine can stop Putin if we stand with Ukraine and provide it the weapons it needs to defend itself" per @POTUS. "That is all Ukraine is asking." he says "But now assistance for Ukraine is being blocked by those who want to walk away from our world leadership"
author: Live UA Map
